message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's a unique opportunity to own something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. I think this is a fair price considering its worth to you.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This would still be a good deal for you, as it's above your own valuation. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking to pay a bit less, but I'm still not willing to go below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $10,800. This is a great compromise, considering the product's value to you.
